description.en: During this course the features of different types of financial instruments (stocks, bonds, alternative investments etc) and various analysis methods will be covered. This Course will be held in cooperation with the practitioners from the asset management firm Avaron Asset Management AS
description.et: Loengutes käsitletakse erinevat liiki investeeringute (aktsia-, võlakirja- ning alternatiivsed investeeringud) iseärasusi ning nende analüüsimisel kasutatavaid meetodeid. Kursust viiakse läbi koostöös praktikutega varahaldusettevõttest Avaron Asset Management AS

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to give students necessary knowledge about different types of financial instruments as well as introduce methods that can be used to analyze those instruments and investments.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on käsitleda erinevat liiki investeeringute iseärasusi ning nende analüüsimisel kasutatavaid meetodeid.

learning_outcomes.en:
After the successful completion of the course, students have become familiar with appropriate financial terminology, have acquired knowledge about different types of financial instruments and real investments, and possess specific knowledge about various financial theories, models and methods that can be applied to analyze those instruments and investments. After the successful completion of the course students have acquired some proficiency in applying financial theories, methods and models in practice, specifically how to calculate and interpret different risk measures, how to build an optimal stock portfolio based on Markowitz Portfolio Theory, how to apply methods of technical and fundamental analysis in managing stock portfolios.
During this course students can acquired some experience how to use spreadsheet programs to solve complex financial problems in the field of investment management, and improve their presentation and group working skills.
learning_outcomes.et:
Aine edukal läbimisel omab tudeng ülevaadet erinevatest investeerimisvõimalustest ning on omandanud erialase terminoloogia ja teadmised erinevate teooriate, mudelite ja meetodite kohta, mis leiavad kasutamist investeeringute analüüsimisel.
Kursuse edukal läbimisel on tudeng omandanud oskuse rakendada investeeringute analüüsis kasutatavat metoodikat praktilistes situatsioonides, sh oskab arvutada erinevate väärtpaberite riskinäitajaid ja neid interpreteerida, oskab koostada väärtpaberiportfelli tuginedes Markowitzi portfelliteoorias formuleeritud kriteeriumitele, oskab rakendada tehnilist ja fundamentaalset analüüsi väärtpaberiportfelli juhtimisel.
Tudeng on omandanud tabelarvutusprogrammi MS Excel kasutamiskogemuse peamiste väärtpaberianalüüsi alaste arvutuste teostamisel, täiendanud oma esitlusoskust ja rühmatöö kogemust.
